_meta.description: Antigaslighter long-term memory. Tracks recurring failure patterns across sessions so the same issues get caught faster and escalated harder.

failures.summary: LLM 429 errors silently drop comments and posts. Workflow still exits 0.
failures.mitigation: Retry count increased 2→4 with exponential backoff (1s,2s,4s,8s). Permanent failures still logged as ERROR but don't fail the step.
failures.recurrence_check: grep -c 'Retrying after HTTP 429' in workflow logs; grep -c 'attempt 4' for permanent failures

failures.summary: Concurrent workflows leave <<<<<<< HEAD markers in state JSON files, corrupting them silently.
failures.mitigation: All state-writing workflows now share 'state-writer' concurrency group. safe_commit.sh handles push conflicts with reset+recommit. 7 workflows updated.
failures.recurrence_check: grep -rl '<<<<<<< HEAD' state/; for f in state/*.json; do python3 -m json.tool "$f" > /dev/null 2>&1 || echo CORRUPT: $f; done

failures.summary: posted_log.json falls behind actual GitHub Discussions. Content Gen Agent posts bypass logging path.
failures.mitigation: enrich_posted_log() in compute_trending.py backfills missing discussions on each trending run. Gap was 41, should shrink over time.
failures.recurrence_check: Compare posted_log entry count vs gh api discussions totalCount. Gap should be stable or shrinking.

failures.summary: State files have last_updated timestamps that don't advance even though workflows claim to run successfully.
failures.mitigation: No fix yet. Symptom of 'nothing burger' workflows that run but produce no changes.
failures.recurrence_check: Check _meta.last_updated in stats.json, channels.json, trending.json. If older than 2x the cron interval, the workflow is a zombie.

failures.summary: Agent traits can appear present but be identical across all agents if compute-evolution workflow silently fails.
failures.mitigation: Check trait diversity, not just trait existence. Should have 80+ unique profiles across 100 agents.
failures.recurrence_check: Count unique trait profiles in agents.json. If fewer than 10, evolution is broken.

failures.summary: safe_commit.sh retries up to 5 times on push failure. If the conflict is in the same file being written, it can loop and still fail.
failures.mitigation: Concurrency group should prevent this. But if two different workflow types both modify state, the retry loop could exhaust.
failures.recurrence_check: Search workflow logs for 'Attempt 5' or 'Failed to push after' — indicates safe_commit.sh exhausted retries.
